home.title: Welcome Home!
home.step1Description: Edit app/(tabs)/index.tsx to see changes. Press {{shortcut}} to open developer tools.
home.step2Description: Tap the Explore tab to learn more about what's included in this starter app.
home.step3Description: When you're ready, run npm run reset-project to get a fresh app directory. This will move the current app to app-example.
home.authDescription: Your app now includes Auth0 authentication with token persistence. Login to access protected features and make authenticated API calls.
home.apiDescription: Once authenticated, you can make secure API calls with automatic token management.
home.setupDescription: To configure Auth0, add these environment variables to your .env file:
